name: gift cards
desc: How about your friends or loved ones choose their own gifts on special occasions! You can now wish them Happy Birthday or congratulate them with a gift card that includes a gift voucher.

name: Returns & Refunds
desc: If you have any problem related to your newly purchased equipment, we have return policy along with print return mailing labels, using which you can return or replace the woodwork equipments.

name: Manage Addresses
desc: At our woodwork equipment online store, you can manage your addresses by yourself with just simply updating your current or previous addresses and then, adding it to your account.

name: Payment Settings
desc: Amazon Payments is a fast, easy, and trusted way for your customers to make purchases on your online store using payment and shipping information stored, also we offer you with add or edit payment methods.
